data_table.description: Psychosocial Scales, Original Cohort Exams 8, 9, and 10. This dataset contains the rating of the respondent's behavior in the interview in regard to: Cooperativeness.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study participant SHARe ID number

variable.name: PS302
variable.description: Rate the respondent's behavior in the interview in regard to: Cooperativeness

variable.name: PS310
variable.description: The exam at which the questionnaire was given to the participant
